wines.description: A distinguished Red Blend showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2011 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of mixed berries and dark fruit, complemented by notes of spice, oak, vanilla. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of herbs. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is balanced and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of layered flavors, integrated tannins. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is harmonious and satisfying, with complex flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 45-60 minutes to integrate flavors

wineDetails.ageability: Ready to enjoy now. Drinking window of 3-5 years from vintage.

wines.productName: Napa Valley Three Clicks Sauvignon Blanc 2017
wines.description: A distinguished Sauvignon Blanc showcasing Napa Valley terroir. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2017 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of grapefruit and lime, complemented by notes of passion fruit, grass. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of grapefruit. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is crisp and refreshing, delivering flavors of vibrant acidity, citrus, minerality. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is zesty and clean, with bright flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2020. Best enjoyed fresh and vibrant.

wines.description: A distinguished Chardonnay showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2024 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of green apple and pear, complemented by notes of citrus, butter, vanilla. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of citrus. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is creamy and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of lemon zest, toast, minerality. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and crisp, with lingering flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.
